name: gansey adventure socks
notes:
welcome! shall we go on an adventure together? these socks are designed in the style of choose-your-own adventure stories. at certain points, you will be able to decide which path you take. different paths will lead to different results. feel free to consult a multi-sided cube of fate should you have any trouble deciding! 

this pattern was available as a warm up for sock madness 2025. now that the competition is over, it is available to the general public. enjoy!

**please note:** pattern only includes instructions for a gansey (knit/purl) version. however, the adventurous knitter shouldn't find it too difficult to adapt the charts for a stranded version. 


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/groups/sock-madness-forever?s=tab
